summary: We made a previous recommendation that DOD should have a chief management officer (CMO) with significant authority to help reduce inefficiencies and save billions of dollars. Congress established the position. However, DOD has not developed guidance that explains how the CMO's authorities and responsibilities should be put into practice. For example, it has not determined how the CMO will exercise authority when there is a...
title: Defense Business Operations: DOD Should Take Steps to Fully Institutionalize the Chief Management Officer Position
